titleStmt.title: A yong-mans most earnest affection to his sweetheart Exprest in a dainty courtly sonnet: first read and heare it, then censure vpon it. To a curious new northerne tune.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Come come my deare that art so pretty,".
Imprint from STC; place of publication conjectured by cataloger.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
